Category.Name: Purina® Puppy Chow® brand Puppy Food Complete & Balanced
Category.Description: Puppies grow and develop at a rapid rate, so they need up to twice the nutrition of adult dogs. That's why Purina® Puppy Chow® brand Puppy Food Complete & Balanced for Growing Puppies is specially formulated with the extra nutrition your puppy needs for proper growth and development.

Category.Name: Purina® Puppy Chow® brand Puppy Food Large Breed Formula
Category.Description: Large breed puppies, those weighing puppies over 50 lbs. at maturity, have special nutritional needs. That's why Purina® Puppy Chow® brand Puppy Food Large Breed Formula targets the nutritional areas that are important to the proper development of large breed puppies: healthy growth rate and bones & joints.

Category.Name: Purina® Puppy Chow® brand Puppy Food Healthy Morsels Soft & Crunchy Bites
Category.Description: Puppies grow and develop at a rapid rate, so they need up to twice the nutriton of adult dogs. That's why Purina® Puppy Chow® brand Puppy Food Healthy Morsels is specially formulated with chewy chunks and crunchy bites with whole grains, real beef, and vegetable accents for overall good health - the extra nutrition your puppy needs for proper growth and development.

Category.Name: Purina® Dog Chow® brand Dog Food Complete & Balanced
Category.Description: The carefully selected, high quality ingredients in Purina® Dog Chow® brand Dog Food Complete & Balanced provide 100% of the essential nutrients your dog needs to help stay happy, healthy and satisfied throughout his long, healthy life.

Category.Name: Purina® Healthy Morsels brand Dog Food With Real Lamb & Rice, Soft & Crunchy Bites
Category.Description: With crunchy bites and meaty chunks, Purina® Healthy Morsels brand Dog Food With Real Lamb & Rice includes whole grains, real lamb & vegetable accents for a perfect balance of taste and nutrition. This 100% nutritionally complete formula contains all of the essential nutrients your dog needs for a long, healthy life.

Category.Name: Naturally Complete from Purina® Dog Chow® brand Dog Food
Category.Description: Naturally Complete for Your Dog's Long, Healthy Life - Your dog completes your family. His energy and enthusiasm has a way of making you smile. So it's important that you make smart choices about his nutrition, selecting healthy foods to help your dog live a long, happy life. And there's an abundance of healthy ingredients found in nature. That's why nature is the inspiration for Naturally Complete from Purina® Dog Chow® brand Dog Food. It is carefully prepared with high quality, great-tasting ingredients, like a wholesome 5-grain blend and hearty beef.

Category.Name: Purina® Little Bites Dog Food
Category.Description: Whether your dog is big or small, there is no denying the big impact that he has had on your life. Your dog's nutrition should support his good health - no matter what his size. That's why Purina® Little Bites is made with crunchy, bite-sized kibble packed with high quality protein including real chicken to help maintain lean muscle mass - all of the great taste and nutrition your dog needs for a long, healthy life.

Category.Name: Purina® Fit & Trim® brand Adult Dog Food
Category.Description: Everyday successes, such as living an active lifestyle and choosing a food that helps keep your dog a little more fit, are important to your dog's happy, healthy life. That's why Purina® Fit & Trim® brand Adult Dog Food along with daily exercise, has been specially formulated to help keep your dog fit, healthy and happy, everyday.

Category.Name: Purina® Active Senior 7+ brand Adult Dog Food
Category.Description: When it comes to your maturing dog, taking a proactive approach to his nutrition helps keep him active, happy, and feeling young. That's why Purina® Active Senior 7+ brand Adult Dog Food is made with easy-to-chew soft chunks and crunchy bites with whole grains. Plus it's formulated with a special combination of high quality protein and antioxidant nutrients, including Vitamins C & E to help your mature dog continue to live a long, healthy life.
